name: Healing
description: It instantly regenerates some health when drank
value: Regenerates 2d6+4 HP

name: Vigor
description: Gives temporary health when drank
value: Gives 1d10 temporary HP for 1 hour

name: Vitality
description: It slowly regenerates health over a period of some hours
value: Regenerates 1 HP per minute for 1 hour

name: Might
description: It gives a bonus to attack rolls after drinking
value: +2 to attack rolls for 10 minutes

name: Courage
description: Gives immunity to fear and some temporary inspiration
value: Immunity to fear and advantage on Wisdom saving throws for 1 hour

name: Giant Strength
description: It gives the user much more strength
value: Strength becomes 25 for 1 minute

name: Flame Resistance
description: It gives resistance to fire damage
value: Resistance to fire damage for 1 hour

name: Cold Resistance
description: It gives resistance to cold damage
value: Resistance to cold damage for 1 hour

name: Necro Resistance
description: Gives resistance to necrotic damage
value: Resistance to necrotic damage for 1 hour

name: Radiant Resistance
description: Gives resistance to radiant damage
value: Resistance to radiant damage for 1 hour

name: Stoneskin
description: Gives resistance to martial damage
value: Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage for 10 minutes

name: Acid Resistance
description: Gives resistance to acid
value: Resistance to acid damage for 1 hour

name: Lightning Resistance
description: Gives resistance to lightning damage
value: Resistance to lightning damage for 1 hour

name: Succubus Charm
description: Makes the drinker irresistible to nearby people
value: Creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 15) or be charmed for 1 hour

name: Shielding
description: Gives the user a magical shield of energy
value: +2 to AC for 1 minute

name: Flame Breath
description: Gives the user fire breath for a short time
value: Fire breath (4d6 damage, 15-foot cone) for 1 minute

name: Growth
description: Makes the user double in size
value: Size doubles and attack damage increases by 1d4 for 10 minutes

name: Shrinking
description: Makes the user half in size
value: Size is halved and AC increases by +2 for 10 minutes

name: Comprehension
description: Lets the user understand all languages
value: Understands all languages for 1 hour

name: Fertility
description: Makes the user very fertile, almost certain to make a baby under its effects!
value: Maximum fertility for 24 hours

name: Intimidation
description: Gives the user a huge booming voice that terrifies those around
value: Creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 15) or be frightened for 1 minute

name: Luck
description: It gives the user a temporary boost to luck
value: Advantage on dice rolls for 1 hour

name: Mana
description: Gives the user more magical power to cast with
value: Regains 1d4 spell slots

name: Arcane
description: Gives the user more powerful spells
value: Spells deal +2 damage for 1 hour

name: Animal form
description: Makes the user turn into a random animal
value: Transform into an animal (CR 1 or less) for 1 hour

name: Dreams
description: Makes the user get lost in a hallucinary dream world of their perfect dream
value: Hallucinations for 1 hour

name: Nightmares
description: Makes the user get lost in a hallucinary dream world of their worst nightmares
value: Frightened and disoriented for 1 hour

name: Stamina
description: Gives the user more stamina and constitution
value: +2 to Constitution for 1 hour

name: Fleet foot
description: Makes the user have more speed
value: Speed increased by 10 feet for 1 hour

name: Knowledge
description: Increases the users intelligence temporarily
value: +2 to Intelligence for 1 hour

name: The Bard
description: Increases the users Charisma temporarily
value: +2 to Charisma for 1 hour

name: Disguise
description: Changes the users form to a disguised form of any race and appeance
value: Transform into another appearance for 1 hour

name: Feast
description: Removes all hunger and thirst from the target
value: Completely nourished and hydrated for 24 hours

name: Youth
description: Makes the user grow some years younger
value: Reduces age by 1d10 years for 24 hours

name: Age
description: Makes the user grow some years older
value: Increases age by 1d10 years for 24 hours

name: Furnace
description: Makes the user radiate with a damaging aura
value: 1d6 fire damage aura in 5-foot radius for 1 minute

name: Eagle Sight
description: Gives the user strong vision and a bonus to perception
value: +5 to Perception and darkvision for 1 hour

name: Health
description: Cures all diseases and illnesses
value: Cures all diseases and conditions

name: Invulnerability
description: Freezes the user in stasis that makes them immune to damage but they cannot move or act
value: Immunity to damage but paralyzed for 1 minute

name: Riddle me gone
description: Gives the user the cure to a single riddle
value: Solves one specific riddle

name: Horrifying appearance
description: Makes the user look more ugly for a time
value: -2 to Charisma for 1 hour

name: Beautiful appearance
description: Makes the user appear more attractive for a time
value: +2 to Charisma for 1 hour

name: Swordsmanship
description: Makes the user more effective and versatile with a blade
value: +2 to attack rolls with melee weapons for 1 hour

name: Bowmanship
description: Makes the user more effective with a bow or ranged weapon
value: +2 to attack rolls with ranged weapons for 1 hour

name: Nymph Breath
description: Gives water breathing
value: Water breathing for 1 hour

name: Midas
description: Makes the user turn things to gold
value: Turns one object to gold (up to 1 foot diameter) for 1 hour

name: Berserker
description: Makes the user rage with great strength
value: Advantage on Strength checks and +2 to damage for 1 minute

name: Utter Hatred
description: Makes the user have bonuses against a particular type of enemy
value: +2 to attack and damage rolls against a specific enemy type for 1 hour

name: Oracle
description: Lets the user divinate the future
value: Can ask one question about the future and receive a vague answer

name: Demonic Leech
description: Heals a portion of all damage the user deals
value: Heals 1d6 HP for every 10 damage dealt for 1 hour

name: Fey Nature
description: Lets the user become one with animals and nature around them
value: Speak with animals and advantage on Nature checks for 1 hour

name: Tracelessness
description: Makes the user very hard to follow
value: Advantage on Stealth checks and leaves no physical tracks for 1 hour

name: Gracefulness
description: Makes the user have a better acrobatics skill
value: +5 to Acrobatics checks for 1 hour

name: Goblin Climb
description: Gives the user a bonus to climbing
value: +5 to Athletics checks when climbing for 1 hour

name: Dead Ringer
description: Makes the user appear completely dead to all magic
value: Appears dead to magical detection for 1 hour

name: One Leafed Clover
description: Gives the user worst luck
value: Disadvantage on all dice rolls for 1 hour

name: Possession
description: Lets the user gain control of a nearby creature, their body comatosed while they do
value: Control one creature for 1 minute (Wisdom save DC 15)

name: Owls Wake
description: Makes the user need no sleep for a time
value: No need to sleep for 24 hours

name: Hawks Flight
description: Lets the user fly
value: Flying for 10 minutes

name: Peace
description: Makes the user very calm and unable to harm others
value: Unable to attack or harm for 1 hour

name: Rejuvenation
description: Heals a single scar or bad injury on the user such as a missing arm
value: Heals one permanent injury

name: Sphinxes Truth
description: Makes the user tell the truth
value: Unable to lie for 1 hour

name: Serpent Tongue
description: Makes the user only able to lie
value: Unable to tell the truth for 1 hour

name: Navigation
description: Makes the user unable to get lost and find where they need
value: Cannot get lost and finds shortest path for 1 hour

name: Hook Horror
description: The users hands become sharp weaponised blades
value: Hands deal 1d8 slashing damage for 10 minutes

name: Schaffensfreude
description: Makes the enemies take damage as they deal it to the user
value: Enemies take half the damage they deal to user for 1 minute

name: Invisibility
description: Makes the user invisible
value: Invisibility for 10 minutes

name: Wild magic
description: Taps into wild magic making an absolutely random thing happen
value: Random effect from the wild magic table

name: Fame
description: Makes the user more famous
value: +2 to Charisma in social interactions for 24 hours

name: Goats Trek
description: Makes the user immune to the toils of long travels and bad weather
value: Immunity to travel fatigue and weather conditions for 24 hours

name: Gargoyle Toughness
description: Increases the users constitution
value: +2 to Constitution for 1 hour

name: Atomic Clock
description: Lets the user know the exact time and date
value: Knows exact time and date permanently

name: Transmutation
description: Lets the user have the ability to change somethings properties
value: Transform one object into another object of same size for 1 hour

name: Iron Skin
description: Turns the users skin to metal giving them many resistances
value: Resistance to physical damage and +2 to AC for 10 minutes

name: Sex Change
description: Changes the users gender
value: Gender change for 24 hours

name: Race Change
description: Changes the users race
value: Race change for 24 hours

name: Musical Breath
description: Makes the user say everything in song, and fey music follows them in the air
value: Speaks in song and draws attention for 1 hour

name: Utter Understanding
description: Makes the user know very intimately about one exact thing
value: Random or chosen. Deep knowledge of one specific subject for 1 hour

name: Split Form
description: The user turns into multiple tiny versions of themselves and controls them all
value: Splits into 1d4 miniature versions (strength -1 for each miniature) for 10 minutes

name: Flavour
description: Makes anything and everything taste amazing!
value: Everything eaten or drunk tastes incredible for 1 hour

name: Glimmer
description: Makes the user and its gear instantly clean and as good looking as possible
value: Cleans and beautifies user and equipment for 1 hour

name: Love
description: Makes the user and someone else fall in love
value: Charmed by a specific creature for 1 hour

name: Poison
description: Poisons the user, weakening them
value: Poisoned for 1 hour (disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws)

name: Rebirth
description: Resurrects the user if they die soon after drinking
value: Resurrects with 1 HP if died within 10 minutes

name: Elemental form
description: Turns the user to an elemental form relevant to their personality
value: Transform into elemental (fire, water, earth, air) for 10 minutes

name: True form
description: Turns the user into a familiar like creature similar to their personality
value: Transform into familiar (cat, dog, bird, etc.) for 1 hour

name: Gods Touch
description: Gives the user a holy connection to their god or fiendish deity
value: Advantage on religion and healing rolls for 1d6 hours

name: Antidepressant
description: Improves the users mood and reduces effects of fear or sadness
value: Immunity to fear and despair for 1 hour

name: Ghostly Form
description: Makes the user intangible and able to phase through objects
value: Incorporeal for 1 minute

name: Artisans Skill
description: Gives the user skill in a particular art temporarily
value: Expert proficiency in one art or craft for 1 hour

name: Godly form
description: Improves all stats
value: +4 to all ability scores for 10 minutes

name: Bless Weapon
description: Makes the users weapons do more damage
value: +1d8 radiant damage with weapons for 10 minutes

name: Euphoria
description: Makes the user feel amazing and trip out
value: Advantage on Charisma checks, disadvantage on Perception, for 10 minutes

name: Bodyguard
description: Creates a spectral bodyguard for a short time who obeys orders
value: Summons spectral guard with 20 HP for 10 minutes

name: Babelfish
description: Lets the user speak any language but not understand it
value: Ability to speak all languages for 1 hour

name: Preservation
description: Stops whatever its poured on from rotting or degrading
value: Preserves one object or food for 1d6 days

name: Fear
description: Makes the user terrified
value: User is frightened for 1 minute (Wisdom save to resist)

name: Night vision
description: Gives the ability to see in the dark
value: Darkvision up to 60 feet for 8 hours

name: Tracking
description: Lets the user track an enemy
value: Advantage on Survival checks to track for 1 hour

name: Cure-all
description: Cures any status effects
value: Removes all negative conditions (poison, paralysis, disease, etc.)
